description.name: oPanel & WoM
description.tagline: The world's most popular web hosting control panel
description.short: oPanel/WoM is the leading web hosting control panel and is the hosting platform of choice by more web hosts than any other.
description.long:
Fully integrated with WHMCS for the best possible experience between web hosting control panel and billing platform.

* Automatic Account Creation
* Automatic Suspension/Termination/Upgrades
* Email Account Creation
* Automated SSL Provisioning & Installation
* Single Sign-On for one-click transition
* OpenID Connect Integration
* WHMCS Connect Integration for easier server administration

[Learn more »](https://opanel.net)
